channel.title: centos7 on Webserver | IT Quicktasks
channel.description: Recent content in centos7 on Webserver | IT Quicktasks

item.title: Quick Install Nginx in CentOS7 + 301 Redirect
item.description: sudo yum install epel-release sudo yum install nginx sudo systemctl start nginx ... ... edit /etc/nginx/nginx.conf ... ... #add this line in bottom of 'server' block: Redirect 301 https://your_domain_here/$request_uri; sudo systemctl restart nginx sudo systemctl enable nginx
